title: Sepp Blatter - Wikipedia
snippet: Joseph Sepp Blatter (born Josef Blatter; 10 March 1936) is a Swiss former football administrator who served as the eighth president of FIFA from 1998 to 2015.

title: Joseph Sepp Blatter (1936 - ) | The Presidency
snippet: Joseph Sepp Blatter was born on 10 March 1936 and is the eighth and current president of FIFA (Fédération Internationale de Football Association), having been elected in June 1998.

title: Sepp Blatter | Biography, FIFA, & Facts | Britannica Money
snippet: Sepp Blatter (born March 10, 1936, Visp, Switzerland) is a Swiss sports executive who served as the president (1998–2015) of FIFA (Fédération Internationale de Football Association), the governing body of international football (soccer) ...

title: FIFA president Sepp Blatter announces resignation amidst corruption scandal | June 2, 2015 | HISTORY
snippet: On June 2, 2015, Sepp Blatter, president of international soccer’s governing body FIFA, steps down, just a few days after he had been re-elected to a fifth four-year term. His resignation came amid rumors that he would soon be under investigation ...
